risks: Token cost escalation as more agents are deployed and usage increases
Security vulnerabilities from exposing sensitive data in agent prompts and configurations
Agent coordination failures leading to duplicate processing or missed tasks
Context drift as ME.md files become outdated or misaligned with current workflows
Dependency on external APIs (OpenAI, Gmail) creating single points of failure
Over-automation leading to reduced human oversight and control
Agent hallucinations or errors causing incorrect automated actions
Potential for agents to amplify biases or make poor decisions at scale
Maintenance burden increasing as agent library grows without proper governance
